Introduction

Minho is a South Korean singer, rapper, and actor under SM Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group SHINee.

In 2006, Minho was discovered through SM Entertainment's Casting System. In March 2008, he modeled for Ha Sang-beg's F/W 08–09 Seoul Collection.

He debuted as a member of SHINee on May 22, 2008 with the group's first mini album Replay.

In 2010, Minho made his acting debut in KBS2's drama special, entitled Pianist, with actress Han Ji-hye.

Minho graduated from high school on February 10, 2010. He then went on to attend Konkuk University, majoring in film. He graduated from the university in 2015.

Minho released his debut solo single, "I'm Home", as part of SM Station on March 28, 2019.

On April 15, 2019, he enlisted into the Marine Corps. He was discharged on November 15, 2020.
